review: I LOVE this game!! its been so long since a GREAT adventure game has been available that hooks you in and keeps you hooked the entire time. I got to the end (so Far) and am dying to finish it. Great work guys!!
Thank you for this Amazing and Brilliant Game. Please Please do another. The voice acting and dialogue was brilliant. I have waited for something like this for a long time. Brilliant!
The game reboots my pc every time within 5 mins. Ill wait for it to be less buggy. Looks good tho.Updated my review/ I had to Diable my SLI to get it to run. runs fine now and seems good so far.
